Title: News From Below
Description:
I could hear the explosions from here. That'll buy us some time. Maybe I'd even be relieved, if this had gone less poorly.

Y'tekhi is secured in the back, where they can't overhear anything. Whatever Xal'atath did... it hasn't worn off yet. The Weaver has people looking into it, but the outlook is grim.

Alleria is going to want a status report. Good luck.
ObjectivesText: Inform Widow Arak'nai about what was found in the Transformatory. Then, return to Alleria at Dornogal on the Isle of Dorn.
RewardText:
At the end of the day, we delayed their advance and got some good, actionable intel that everyone up here can work towards.

Was it worth it? Time will tell.

Objectives.Text: Report back to Alleria at the Coreway in Dornogal
